languages.text: Один из цехов охвачен скверной: машины без остановки разбирают соседние механизмы, заглатывают работников и собирают из них омерзительные сплавы металла и плоти.
One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.
languages.original_text: Один из цехов охвачен скверной: машины без остановки разбирают соседние механизмы, заглатывают работников и собирают из них омерзительные сплавы металла и плоти.

traits.locale_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.
Heresy rears its head on Kiava Gamma: remnants of filth cause compulsions in workers and technomats.
One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.
Heresy rears its head on Kiava Gamma: remnants of vile forces cause compulsions in workers and technomats.

One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

languages.text: L'un des ateliers a succombé à la corruption : ses machines démantèlent les mécanismes environnants et dévorent les ouvriers pour fabriquer de répugnants amalgames de chair et de métal.
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

traits.locale_text: L'un des ateliers a succombé à la corruption : ses machines démantèlent les mécanismes environnants et dévorent les ouvriers pour fabriquer de répugnants amalgames de chair et de métal.

languages.text: 作業場のひとつが腐敗の一途をたどっていた。内部の機械は周囲の機構を分解し、労働者を丸呑みにして、金属と肉体の忌まわしい塊を作り上げる。
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

traits.locale_text: 作業場のひとつが腐敗の一途をたどっていた。内部の機械は周囲の機構を分解し、労働者を丸呑みにして、金属と肉体の忌まわしい塊を作り上げる。

languages.text: 其中一个车间已经被腐化彻底污染。车间里的机器拆掉了其他机械，将里面的工人活活吞噬，制造出了金属与肉体混合而成的怪物。
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

traits.locale_text: 其中一个车间已经被腐化彻底污染。车间里的机器拆掉了其他机械，将里面的工人活活吞噬，制造出了金属与肉体混合而成的怪物。

languages.text: Uno de los talleres ha caído en manos de la corrupción. Las máquinas que contiene desmantelan rápidamente los mecanismos colindantes y devoran trabajadores enteros para crear repugnantes amalgamas de carne y metal.
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los talleres ha caído en manos de la corrupción. Las máquinas que contiene desmantelan rápidamente los mecanismos colindantes y devoran trabajadores enteros para crear repugnantes amalgamas de carne y metal.

languages.text: Eine der Werkstätten ist der Verderbnis anheim gefallen. Die Maschinen darin zerlegen die Mechanismen in der Umgebung und verschlucken Arbeiter bei lebendigem Leib, um widerwärtige Mischwesen aus Metall und Fleisch herzustellen.
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.

traits.locale_text: Eine der Werkstätten ist der Verderbnis anheim gefallen. Die Maschinen darin zerlegen die Mechanismen in der Umgebung und verschlucken Arbeiter bei lebendigem Leib, um widerwärtige Mischwesen aus Metall und Fleisch herzustellen.

languages.text: Atölyelerden biri yozluğa yenik düştü: İçindeki makineler, çevredeki mekanizmaları söküyor ve metal ile etin iğrenç birleşimlerinden oluşan yaratıklar oluşturmak için işçileri bütün olarak yutuyor.
languages.original_text: One of the workshops has fallen to corruption: the machines within disassemble the surrounding mechanisms and swallow workers whole to construct repulsive amalgams of metal and flesh.
